name: linkedin-llm-post-detector
description: A browser extension that identifies LinkedIn posts with self-centered content containing the author's image and allows unsubscribing from them.

scripts.convert-icons: npx svgexport icons/icon16.svg icons/icon16.png 16:16 && npx svgexport icons/icon48.svg icons/icon48.png 48:48 && npx svgexport icons/icon128.svg icons/icon128.png 128:128

author: Your Name
